theme__roller__welcome: This is the Theme Roller test-page. Below you can find any Typography or GUI element that may exists in you composition.

help__text__1: This is the Theme Roller Control. Here you can view CSS rules and edit their colors. To edit colors just click anywhere on the page on an element you want to change...

help__text__2: Yes! Maybe this one... You may noticed that the Theme Roller Control has identified different color settings for this button. OK... Ready? Then let us change some colors now.

help__text__3:
The next step is very easy. Click on a color information you want to change and enter a color in hexadecimal or RGB format.
Well... It should be very easy now to creaty realy cool and fresh themes.

intro__text__a: Please select an element anywhere on the page.

intro__text__b: I will find the CSS rules regarding to the clicked element if there are color informations available.

intro__text__c: You may also try to click the 'Help' button to get more informations about how this works.
